mesquite.lib.characters

Interface MCharactersDistribution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Listable, MCharactersStatesHolder, Renamable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MAdjustableDistribution, MCharactersHistory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MCategoricalAdjustable, MCategoricalDistribution, MCategoricalEmbedded, MCategoricalHistory, MContinuousAdjustable, MContinuousDistribution, MContinuousEmbedded, MContinuousHistory, MDNAAdjustable, MDNAEmbedded, MDNAHistory, MMeristicAdjustable, MMeristicDistribution, MMeristicEmbedded, MMeristicHistory, MProteinAdjustable, MProteinEmbedded, MProteinHistory

    public interface MCharactersDistribution
extends MCharactersStatesHolder
    Stores states at each of the terminal taxa, for each of many characters. See general discussion of character storage classes under CharacterState

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MCharactersHistory adjustHistorySize(Tree tree, MCharactersHistory charStates)
      Adjusts the size of the passed MCharacterHistory to be of the same type as this MCharactersDistribution and to be prepared to store states for each of the nodes of the tree.
      Tree getBasisTree()
      get the tree on which this was simulated or otherwise based, if any
      CharacterDistribution getCharacterDistribution(int ic)
      return CharacterDistribution object for character ic
      MAdjustableDistribution makeBlankAdjustable()
      return blank adjustable MCharactersDistribution if this same type
      CharacterData makeCharacterData(CharMatrixManager manager, Taxa taxa)
      return CharacterData filled with same values as this matrix
      void setBasisTree(Tree tree)
      sets the tree on which this was simulated or otherwise based, if any

      • Methods inherited from interface mesquite.lib.Listable
